content: RE: http://www.military.com/forums/0,15240,118006,00.html My great uncle Robert Reilly flew the plane. He left behind a family, and his children never knew him. Of course there should be something to honor them-whether they died in combat or not-they still served and were obeying orders.
reply: RE: http://www.military.com/forums/0,15240,118006,00.html My great uncle Robert Reilly flew the plane. He left behind a family, and his children never knew him. Of course there should be something to honor them-whether they died in combat or not-they still served and were obeying orders.
title: Medallion Honors Marines Killed in Mt. Rainier Crash
